negotiator.actions

Class Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • negotiator.actions.Action
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Accept, EndNegotiation, EndNegotiationWithAnOffer, GiveFeedback, IllegalAction, Inform, InformPartyList, InformVotingResult, NoAction, Offer, Reject, VoteForOfferAcceptance

    public abstract class Action
extends java.lang.Object
    Class which symbolizes a high level action.
    Author:
    Tim Baarslag and Dmytro Tykhonov
